Text:
Album info

I Loved Her First is the debut album of American country music band Heartland. Issued in 2006 as their only album, it features the hit single "I Loved Her First", a Number One on the Billboard Hot Country Songs charts. Also released from this album were the singles "Built to Last" (#59 on Hot Country Songs) and "Let's Get Dirty" (failed to chart). The track "(There's) No Gettin' Over Me" is a cover of Ronnie Milsap's Number One country hit from 1981.

Track Listings:

1. Boys Like Us
2. Play Hurt
3. You
4. Built To Last
5. No Getting Over Me
6. Let's Get Dirty
7. Too Country
8. Freebird In A Firebird
9. I Loved Her First
10. Mississippi Mud
11. Judge A Man By The Woman
